text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Donetsk Raion | native_name = Донецький район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_map = Donetsk Rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = 225px | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 2020 | government_footnotes = | leader_name1 = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2895.1 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1,484,514 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto }} Donetsk Raion is a prospective raion (district) in Donetsk oblast in eastern Ukraine. Russian soldiers are occupying most of the district (as of 2023). ==Administrative divisions== * Amvrosiivka (hromada) * Donetsk (hromada) * Ilovaisk (hromada) * Khartsyzk (hromada) * Makiivka (hromada) * Yasynuvata (hromada) ==Related page== *Warfare in eastern Ukraine during the Russo-Ukrainian War ==Sources== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Raions of Donetsk Oblast
title: Donetsk Raion
